attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!😾😿🙀
attributes.review: This app is complete GARBAGE!! DOES NOT WORK!! FAKE!! It took days to download and when it finally downloaded the experience was HORRIBLE!!! The lay out it BAD, its very confusing and i got hacked. PLS DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS STINKY APP🤢🤢🤢 MY PHONE HAS NOT BEEN ACTING RIGHT EVER SINCE I DOWNLOADED IT! Do not be tricked!! Cheeto Mans app is garbage and theres not much more i can say, besides do not get this stinky poopoo app🤢🤢

attributes.title: rate one star!!
attributes.review: this app took 110 days of summer to download and after that it would not stop saying the n word. i am a raging homosexual and i don’t know how it knew but it called me the f slur on repeat as well. did not feed my gerbil like they promised and now she died of starvation. RIP coco 😿😿. overall stupid app.

attributes.title: Not worth it
attributes.review: It took a long time to download and when it was finished the app wouldn’t even open and I kept trying to open until I just didn’t care anymore so I just deleted it off my phone

attributes.title: WROST APP EVER
attributes.review: Ever time I open the app it has trump say the n word an now after downloading the app my phone gets really hot like it’s about to explode and I get random calls now but it two other people taking about what there going do with ice kids an currently they’re all under DC

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app completely glitches out every time I tried to use it! Not only that, but it took so long to download. Never getting again! I hope everyone out there heeds my warning and does NOT download this!!

attributes.title: i’m scared 😳☝🏼
attributes.review:
if i could give this app ONE STAR i would !! i downloaded it to keep up with MY president 🍊 and now my whole house is hacked!! my lights keep turning on and off, my TV is only playing the Rachel Ray show, and my oven set my house on fire (killing my meemaw rip).
In conclusion do NOT download this app 🧚🏼

attributes.title: What even is this app??
attributes.review: This app is horrible and terrifying! It downloaded like normal but then after opening up the app it’s just filled with pictures of Donald Trump! I don’t understand! What if my child where to get a hold of this app? 🤢🤢🤢🤢 I cant believe Apple allows this to exist.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!! DONT TRUST IT!!!!!!!
attributes.review:
This app absolutely DESTROYED my phone!!!!!! It took forever to download, and when I tired to open it, IT WOULDNT OPEN!!!!!! After three days of trying, I finally got in, but then it DOWNLOADED A VIRUS ON MY PHONE!!!!!!! 0/10, I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!

(Also trump is a horrible person so why were you downloading this app anyways?)

attributes.title: 10/10 DONT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: 10/10 don’t recommend this app was absolutely developed horrible and was never meant to represent what it’s actually meant to represent when I first opened the app it immediately played the ompia lompia song absolutely disappointed but this 1 star !

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review:
Ugh - this app ended up giving my phone a virus. Apparently it could have been prevented by wearing a mask but I’m not a sheep. 

Took up way too much space on my phone, was very laggy and honestly lacked any education in the app. Wish I could give it 0 stars
